content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to get the mail.  noticed what i thought was a police helicopter.  it seemed like a spotlight was shining at me.  i noticed bright lights with edges as if through crystal.  my brother and i watched the light for over 2 hours.  it did not move other than slightly around it center.  i was about the size of my hand with strong illumination as if looking into a spotlight.  the edges were like light reflected through crystal.
content.summary: Observed extremely bright light hovering over city

content.detailedDescription:
I am a farmer and live on the same family farm all my life. it was me and my wife and two year old son at the time. my wife a school teacher had just cooked a great looking meal. this afternoon we were having dinner on the back patio and it was a quite normal country afternoon on the farm. please allow me to add that me and my wife until that day had never seen anything out of this world or paranormal ever. my wife spotted a huge cargo jet airliner coming down fast it appeared t her to be crashing? she go's crazy trying to get our son away from the house! the jet appeared to us at that time to really be crash landing on us and our house? at first the jet was high and looked like a normal plane in trouble? when we first spotted the jet it was maybe 500 ft. off the ground? the strange thing was it seemed to come down fast then we looked up again and it appeared to just come to a dead stop in air? the other most crazy and amazing thing was we heard nothing no sound at all coming from the engines?  now because of the strange no sounds? we froze and just watched this huge floating military cargo jet airplane with huge jet engines and wings just floating right for us. the jet got very very close then banked right and floated right passed us with still no sound coming from nothing? the jet was so silent you could hear the wind passing over her wings. at this time the jet was 50 ft. from the ground? and the distance from us to the jet "line of sight" was maybe 100 yards or closer? the jet moved passed us very slow and very close. guessing the speed was 5 mph. still watching the jet but now from the tail end and we noticed the thing had to climb to get over the 100 acres of woods and trees just 700 yards behind our house. folks let me say again this huge flying military looking cargo jet was below tree top level and floating over our house in the middle of the country with no people no building no nothing just me and my wife and son? "and no sounds"  "please tell me how can a military c-17 cargo jet float in air?"  "also let me say we thought it was over? we thought at first this thing was crashing on us and our lives was over including my sons life? we were very very scared!" we did noticed the jet had no identifying numbers of any kind? i only seen a white star on the tail fin. the windows and cabin area was all blacked out. the body of the jet including the wings and engines and all the other parts was all dull black. i cannot be 100% for sure but the closest we can get is a boeing c-17 cargo jet airplane. it was like watching a floating city come over your house in daylight with no sound?  i have been secretly searching for 20 years but still have no answers.

jon
content.summary: Spotted a huge military jet. appeared to be crashing on us? not a normal jet "floated right over us no sound"

content.detailedDescription: It was 8pm in the winter so it was dark out. i was driving sw on monkton road. there were no other cars on the road at this time. i noticed through the trees to my right three large bright lights all equally spaced and parallel to the ground. it was above the ground, but lower than the trees, following me at my exact speed for less than an 8th mile. then the lights slowly turned from horizontal to vertical (still following me) and suddenly flew off. it flew off so fast it would have been easy for me to assume that it just disappeared but i recall seeing the lights get smaller a split second before i stopped seeing them. the direction was both away from me and up at the same time (a diagonal). all this happened with about 20 feet of road lining trees between us. immediately after this the treeline stopped and i could see for many miles over some crop fields (somewhat of a valley. the ufo was completely gone. visibility was open so there was nothing it could have been hiding behind. i drove for a half mile longer (in shock) before deciding to stop my car. i got out and looked around, it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo followed me while driving, then changed direction and flew away

content.detailedDescription:
We went to a lavender festival in july 2013 when this was taken. it was my sister, our friend & i sitting at a gazebo when she started taking some images of the scenery. she tried to duplicate it again after showing us (was surprised because she's never seen anything like it before - has been into photography for ages) but was unable to do so. we think it's probably a lens flare but wanted to get some feedback from someone either way if possible.

the information on your form was not 100% accurate because i finally had this image sent to me recently via facebook messaging. i honestly wasn't even going to bother showing anyone but had the urge to within the past week.

thanks for your time;

jamie
content.summary: Is this a lens flare or something unexplained?

content.detailedDescription: Myself & my colleagues were at work at stocks hall residential home in ormskirk uk. at 12am on the 26/11/13 myself & 1 of my colleagues nipped outside the front for a cigare when i had finished talking i turned around & seen white lights in the sky which i realized were moving. i said to both my colleagues "what is it". the three of us stepped forward to get a better look but there are tall trees on the homes ground. i asked 1 of my colleagues to come out the drive but before doing so i ran inside for my phone. when going out of the drive we had full view & i started to film on my mobile phone. this thing was the size of a football field if not bigger & it was flipping like a coin to one side of the sky to another & whilst doing this it was spinning & pulsating from the middle. whilst this was happening i asked one of my colleagues to go & get our other colleague so she could see. none of us could believe what we was seeing. myself & another colleague walked further & i started taking pics thener after made our way back inside. after a few seconds we both looked back out & it wasgone.P
content.summary: Seen white lights in the sky. object was flipping like a coin whilst spinning & pulsating

content.detailedDescription:
we first saw them from the nw flying over west maui mountains mount kukui aprox 5500ftmsl ...Flew to sw .. so this was viewed from our right to left over a distance of aprox 30 miles...
when over maui's main valley 2 craft turned 90degrees towards kahoolawe island, 4 flew straight sw and over the southern slope of mt. haleakala at aprox the 5000ft level..
 the 2 that turned left to kahoolawe left a short very, very faint green trail just a whisp...
they were 6 of us outside because our guests were leaving for home... we were in awe and i could not get my video camera as they would have flew out of sight by then....

 i have been a pilot since the late 70's and are pretty sure of the altitude and heading... they were in our vision aprox 10 or less minutes,, aprox speed maybe 600mph...

 what was the most stiking was their light.... a avocado green but super bright like a tig welding light but no wavering just a steady sparkling kind of light!!! like a star that doesn't twinkle just super bright.... surely others must have seen them but we never heard any reports about them.

 i thought of calling the kahului (ogg) tower or faa but decided not to... a decision i now regret as others may have reported it... i also considered 911 but didn't...

i know the elevations of the mountains so my altitude is accurate... and i fly out of here...
they were first in a straight line not quite a echelon formation but very steady and precise..
then 2 peeled off to kahoolawe with just a whisp of a green tail almost none... at the closest they were about 1 mile away and no sound at all..... we see f-15's, f-16's, f-22's, and a-10's but we would have heard them...
 they were things we never saw before.....

 my girlfriend and i saw red ones 40yrs. ago but won't go into it at this time....

these green ones were so different and we knew we all saw something that is either top secret or not of this world so i decided to contact you..

you can print my story but don't use my name please..

i can draw you a diagram if you wish.
content.summary: 6 orbs steady very bright green light like a tig welding light

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fox news i was looking at the view behind the guest . he was infront of window during interview. i was looking behind the guest admiring the sly line of seattle when i seen  black disk go about sped of fast plane change direction and travel across seattle in less then a second. i have looked at this many times this is not abug on a screen this is not a plane this is not a helicopter. this is defiantly the best evidence of something that can be seen anywhere. it is on my cable box i recorded it it cannot be tampered with. many people have seen it and either were freaked out or said what the hell is that. i've studied it frame by frame and guess the object to be 20 to thirty feet long. the object flys over the building and out koi sight . this was a live background for interview i watched the sky several times watching the clouds and they are defiantly moving. i've googled the show with different key words describing ufos and haven't found anything. i cannot download video it is on my cable box or if their is away i don't know how.
content.summary: Watching fox news plain as day i have it on my dvd multiple people have seen it. freaks them out best ufo sighting i have ever seen

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the parking lot of the new ymca when my 4 year old son pointed out 3 airplanes flying at the same time to the west of us.  since i was already driving our car, i was only able to glance briefly to see what appeared as 2 white lights (obvious airplanes) and a glowing red fire object (not a plane) all flying indepently in different parts of the sky, off to our left.  
we only live 4 blocks away so i jumped out of the car immediately upon arriving home.  i had a small video recorder in my hand since i had just recoreded my sons soccer practice.  i immediately saw what appeared to be a giant fire (the size of a cargo plane??) drifting across the sky, but making no sound.  the recording i made is pretty bad since i rushed to get it on video before it went behind the trees or behind my house.
as i ran across the front yard, i was able to zoom in briefly.  the sky was dark.  you will see the object dissappear for a few seconds.  look closely, you will see that the view was obstructed by my house.  i kept walking towards the side/back yard.  you will see the object reappear on the other side of my house, albeit much fainter.  so faint, in fact, that the camera has trouble focusing in on it.  if you look closely, you will watch it slowly vanish into the sky.  it simply dissappeared as if a fire was put out.  their were no clouds that night.
this incident took place 2 years almost to the day that i saw a similar object come out of the east (the direction of philly international airport) and float across the sky, above our house.  my son, 2 years old at the time, and wife, all witnessed the event as it took place over about 5 minutes.  this object looked like a floating sky fire as well, and made no sound.
content.summary: Looked like a fireball floating across the sky.  no sound. 2 airplanes were present initially.

content.detailedDescription: I filmed several orbs over downtown windsor ontario, didnt notice until afer viewing the tape. and my camera scrabbled out the once and only time at the end of the 30 sec clip. when i pause the video at 6 secs you can really get a good look at the one, it is pretty close to where i was, i would saw about 150 ft from me just about tree line, soft ball to basket ball size, looks almost metallic. shiny. as it swoops up more come out of no where as they sort of like just appear from another deminsion is my only thoughts. or they are some how cloaked invisible. they flew around with control but spruratically, was insane to watch even on film. when i first saw it, my stomach sank in wonder and sadness i never notice while the event was taking place but they moved so fast im not surprised i didn't see them if not looking for them. 4 months later and i still watch the video in aww and wonder.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several orbs filmed

content.detailedDescription: Driving to school to joplin missouri. in st louis we noticed a big yellow glowing light in the middle of the sky. it looks to close and big to be a star, compared to the stars i have seen during my life. it's too big to be an airplane and it is the only light in the sky! it has to be a ufo. there are beams comming out of the light i'n all directions. please check this out and let me no what this is!
content.summary: Random big light. too big for a star not a airplane and not moving. lines beaming out of it

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house and i was in their back yard with my binoculars staring into the sky. the backyard is surrounded by trees and as i was looking up i noticed the object coming from the east over the trees moving westward over the trees. it was moving at a consistent speed and it was very low as in just above the trees. i watched it go for about 6 seconds with the naked eye and then got the binoculars on the object for a few more seconds before is was gone out of my sight. i was able to see it pretty well with just the naked eye but with the binoculars i got a better view of the object. the object was boomerang shaped and seemed to be transparent or cloaked. it had 5 white lights that appeared to be illuminating more so from within the craft then on the outside. i could tell the shape because it was outlined. i could see the outline but not the surface of the craft. i felt curious! just wanted to know what it was i was looking at.
content.summary: I was sky gazing and over the trees to the east i seen a boomerang shaped object with five lights moving west

content.detailedDescription: On friday evening at approx 9:30 pm i stepped outside to get some fresh air. from the front of my house looking south east i noticed a bright glowing disc shaped object hovering mid air over spring valley approx one mile south of mount miguel. the ufo had small blinking red lights on top and was slowly moving south. i called out to my two friends in the house and they also witnessed it, but by the time they had seen it it was almost gone. unfortunately, i did not have my video camera or cell phone device to capture images. i'm really surprised that this has not been reported on the news.
content.summary: A bright glowing disc shaped ufo with small red blinking lights on top

content.detailedDescription:
Observed 40 to 50 lights in sky all yellow.  facing north over the lake.
lights were stationary and eventually faded out.  i called the police dept 
and they saw it also.  i don't know what i saw, can you explain the yellow lights?  they eventually faded out.
content.summary: 40 to 50 lights in northern sky all yellow!

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my sister both observed, at first, only 2 pulsating lights heading northwest to southwest. about 30 seconds after the first two, we observed 4 more lights, all in a straight line path. shortly thereafter, we observed 2 more lights following behind the other 4, only these 2 changed position with one another. the continued southwest, moving very slowly before disappearing suddenly two at a time.
content.summary: Series of lights hovering towards the southwest

content.detailedDescription:
The object was too bright to tell shape other than it looked like a very bright white star or planet that was stationary in the sw sky nearby my property fence line in voc sedona, az.

whatever the object was it stopped my cell phone camera from being able to photograph it. i took control of what my cell phone camera was sighting upon. at the time and afterwards my wife firmly defended it as being nothing more than the planet venus. i will concede that is possible but
unless someone will come forward and show me why my photos (which i am submitting)were able to be totally flushed out with color, then i believe what i attempted to photograph was a ufo and not a planet or star. 

the reason for my having stated this is that i have already, over the years since 2000,photographed, video taped and submitted a number of excellent defined photos of unknown craft flying nearby my home. the only reason i am submitting these photos is that the following day and since the camera has photographed, with no adjustment of controls, had no trouble at all. also if this happened to me are there others having the same problems?
content.summary: My wife pointed out the object to me but kept insisting it was only a real bright withe star though when i photographed it with my cell camera all i got was 1 red brown and two bright red pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from the detroit area when i noticed an object in the sky just west of i75.  it wasn't moving and it was rather large in size. there were planes in the area however; they were small in size compared to what i saw. as i got closer to the downriver area it began moving south still west of i75.  i tried to take pictures of it but was unsuccessful.  part of this object had a partial shape of a star (3 points) that i could see.  i could see a small amount of color protruding from the points.  as i got off on my exit it switched directions due east, toward the lake. when i was dropped off at home, i hurried up and got in my car and went down to the lake.  the object was hovering and i didn't notice any sound(there were no planes in the area at the lake).  i got my camera out and took a video.  this was one of the most amazing things i have ever witnessed.  i shot one quick video, then i got scared and jumped in the car.  then i decided to go back because i figured, i'll never get to see something like this again!  i took a video that lasted about six minutes or so.  this object was incredible.  it moved like something i have never seen before and the colors were beautiful. the object was moving side to side incredibly fast so quick it appeared to change shape. the movements were erratic - one second it would be still, then it would go straight up, zig zag then drop straight down. i drove back home and called my brother so he could see it for himself.  when he got outside it was gone!  i truly wish i would have stayed at the lake to see how it took off or at least caught that part on video.
content.summary: I saw an object in the sky that caught my attention! it was amazing and i shot a video of it.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on to my back porch at 3:45 am to smoke a cigarette when i noticed what seemed to be two large, out of place stars that were to my north (over the pt. marion pennsylvania area) at an unknown elevation.. they were pulsating from white-red-orange-blue.. the first one remained stationary for about 4 minutes when it disappeared and reappeared to the right of where i had originally saw it. it the made a 90 degree turn and flew in almost a zig zag pattern and then disappeared kind of like a shooting star. while all this was happening, the other object remained stationary for about 4-5 minutes longer. it continued to pulse during this time but at one point it disappeared for about 10-15 seconds and then reappeared in the same spot for about another minute and then disappeared for good.
i'd like to add that i'm an amateur astronomer/star gazer and have never seen anything like this. ever. i'd also like to add that it was very very cloudy tonight and there were no aircraft in the sky at this time. it was very quiet and these objects made no noise whatsoever.
i'm a 30 year old college student and have been interested in and have studied aircraft for most of my life. i know that there isn't any aircraft or human being for that matter that could've survived the g-forces that would've been produced making 90 degree turns as this objects did.
at first i was amazed and awestruck. i couldn't help but stare at the objects in amazement. when the object performed the zig zag pattern and shot off like a shooting stat i definitely felt an overwhelming sense of fear because i knew what i was watching wasn't anything of this earth. after the sighting i google searched who i was suppose to file a report with after witnessing a ufo and it led me here.. that was the first thing that came to mind. i immediately tried to write a report with my phone but it wouldn't work properly and had to get my laptop. i'm still kind of stunned at this point.. over an hour and a half later.. and waaay past my bedtime at this point.
i just hope someone saw what i did.. so i don't feel as crazy as i do right now.
content.summary: Late night pulsating star-like ufos

content.detailedDescription: Arrived home at about 2:25am , parked the car and looked up at stars. the object was red and starlike, moving roughly 10 times faster than an airplane. my first thought was that it could be a satellite. the object was traveling north, and slightly shifted north east during its travel. i knew it could not have been an airplane, because i have never seen an airplane move that fast through the sky at night, nor during the day.  i ended up losing sight of the object, due to it going too far over the houses and continuing on its path.
content.summary: Red star like object accelerating roughly 10 times faster than conventional aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was doing as usual out on my porch at 9pm having a cigarette when i was saying to myself im ganna see one im ganna see one, when i was looking in the right place at the right time it must have been at least 50-100kms away and about 3-5kms high it just appeared as a circle of bluish white or whitish blue and dropped down fast over papakura (south) then it changed direction south west and did not change its speed  all but i did notice that it had changed shape to slightly oval, in one swift move this happened i then proceeded to track it with my head quickly it went behind trees and houses and i fell from the step but i didn't care i wanted to watch it ive told 5 close friend and family coz the average new zealander would call me nuts...  
                        m.Stewart otahuhu nz
content.summary: Aprox 3-5km high dropped with great speed the headed s/w very fast i fell of the step trying to

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to take trash out lit a cig and walked over to the center of my driveway and looked at the sky not too high and seen a huge orange ball as i looked at it it started splitting up and flying objects was flying away slowly no noise could be heard from anywhere i screamed ufos i ran in the house yelled at my son to go out to the porch i grabbed my camera went back out to the front of my house and still was about 15 of them they all had orange glowing about them they flashed and the moved slowly and seperating going into different direction  my camera would not work right at all and i got it to work and took some pictures  nothing turned out on them i ran back in grabbed the binoculars and was trying to find them in them that was not working out either with my camera around my neck i turned it back on pictures still not turning out i called my daughter that lives across town and told her go outside she did but seen nothing because of the u shape building she lives in .Within 5 minutes later she called me she got into her car and drove to more open space and said mom i see 1 its right in front of me its huge saucer shape with like a dome on it mom i am coming over we will chase it . she was just 6 blocks away then my son and i hopped in her car and we drove northeast because thats where most of them flew we drove more north and seen 3 more we stopped the car and started taking pictures again nothing but a sqiggly line showed up. we then drove south into the direction she seen the first one she seen and it was still there not as close but there we drove to the top of a parking lot took another picture before snapping it i said look at this it looks like a moon in my camera she said yeah it does i snapped the picture  again just a squiggly line when i looked back in the direction it was it was gone we looked all around and they all was gone . we drove back to my house 6 blocks back to the west and when we got out of the car airplanes started flying in to land at stl lambert airport . it was strange because this whole time we didnt really hear or see a plane i only live approx 10 miles from the airport i called the airport and they did not know what i was talking about
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Orange ball split into 20 or so pieces they all flew in different directions some hovered some flew away flying slowly lasted about 45 minutes til the last one was gone. several minutes later airplanes started flying  in to land at stl lambert airport

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had just finished dinner with some friends and were driving to the grocery store. we were heading west on i-90 and driving through westlake at just after 5pm. 

as i was driving, i happened to notice a series of what appeared to be light trails that seemed to be floating in the sky. i'm not sure what made me notice the lights but i couldn't look away. they had a quantity similar to that of a jet stream youd see in the sky, except that these were reddish in color, and the trail never disappeared.

i made the remark to my wife that it was odd and asked her to check her phone to see if there were any meteor showers that might explain the lights. the lights all seemed to be moving in unison, from left to right, which in this context was roughly south to north. i remember thinking that was odd that the lights seemed to move at the same speed. at that point we agreed that we are not looking at a group of meteors. 

i took a series of photos from my phone that show the lights but the contrast is low. 

we exited the highway and continued to watch the lights from a parking lot. we counted 14 lights, which by this time were moving in different directions and at varying speeds. we witnessed one change directions completely, from moving towards the horizon to moving straight up to the sky.  we watched it til it disappeared. 

the light trails seemed to change in length as well which we noticed on closer review. we could not discern a pattern or destination point. 

after about 15 minutes of watching the light trails, the last of them fell behind the treeline. we sat in the lot a few more minutes. as we left we make our eyes on the sky and saw what i believe to be jets moving at a very very fast speed in the direction the light trails were moving in. i know this was human activity because the her streak was white and disappeared behind the jet. there was also visible flashing lights on the vessel.
content.summary: Driving to the store, i noticed a group of lights that appeared to be moving in a group.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving home from work in oromocto, nb, canada, towards jemseg,nb on route 105.We got off work at 1130pm, so the approximate time was midinght, atlantic time zone. it was fall of 2006.

  my friend was alone in a car ahead of me. me and another co-worker were in my car. the road follows the saint jonh river,and as we went around a long sweeping turn, i saw a light in my mirror and thought it as a motorcycle coming up behind me. then i noticed the light didn't follow the road,instead cutting across the corner of the river, and thought it must have been a military helicopter from near by cbf gagetown.

  the light came closer, maybe 50 yards off the road into a farmers field and 50 yards up in the air slightly behind my car. it was close enough i knew it wasn't a helicopter, and i started to get a bit nervous. i slowed down to around 30km/hour, rolled down my window and stuck my head out to look at it, and heard no noticeable sounds. at this point i knew for sure it wasn't a helicopter.The light did not do any intricate maneuvers, it just matched my speed and followed me for 3 or 4 minutes.

 i was starting to get really nervous, and decided i was going to get out of the car and look at this thing. my co-worker in the passenger seat looked me in the eye, and told me "are you f**king nuts? keep driving!" i could tell he was nervous/scared too so i punched the gas petal and sped off. sometime as i was driving i lost sight of the light. i did not see the light disappear, but i was told by my friend in the car ahead of me there was a streak of light and it disappeared.

after this i got to the little country store where my co-workers and i met to carpool, and asked the guy in the car ahead of me if he saw the light. he only noticed it as it was streaking away, but his clock in the dash and his cell phone clock were stopped at the same time (about 15 mins from the actual time). my car clock was unaffected.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing ball following car

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday, november, 26, 2013, at 6:13pm-6:15pm, i sat outside in my backyard to smoke a cigarette.  looking up into the night's sky i thought to myself, "i cannot believe in all my years i have never seen a ufo" when on que i saw a bright, well-lit object emanating three distinct lights from the front of it; red, green and white, blinking in a pulsating pattern from its right to left, flying in from the tree line, towards my direction.  this object was flying very slowly and rather closely to the ground, and appeared to be slightly descending.  i followed it to my front yard where i observed the object already sitting stationary above my neighbor's house across the street.  the object was not literally above my neighbor's house, but its placement from where i stood appeared to be above my neighbor's house.  in reality, it was most likely towards or in the defiance area if not further, as opposed to in st charles.  
while watching this object, i happened to notice a second lighted object, similar to the first, also sitting stationary in the air to its left.  i do not know from where it came or for how long it had been there before noticing it, but soon after i watched it fly back toward the tree line, from where i saw the first object fly in from.  again it flew low enough, even lower in fact, that i was able to see it was black, had v shaped louvers, had four lights; two sets of lights each; one in front, one in back; one row red and other white.  when i turned around to see what the first object was doing however, i saw that an identical object had already replaced the very object i just watched fly away!  this happened maybe four to six more times before the initial craft i first saw left and for the night.   the first crafts was the last to leave.
i also saw a third light in the sky during the times these other lights and crafts were hovering.  this one though, was just a red light, going back and forth from the center object to the side objects.  to me, it looked like acting as if a watch dog.

after all the excitement was gone from the front yard, i went to the back door downstairs to see if i could view anything left in the sky from behind the house.  i opened the door and heard something that startled me, so i instantly closed the door and ran upstairs.  suddenly then the air became so electrically charged that it was almost suffocating for me.  i kept waving my arms in the air as if to push something off my back, because it literally felt like something attached itself to me.  sounds crazy i know, but no more crazier than what i had just witnessed.


the very next night the lighted object was seen virtually in the same place.  it has been seen two nights more, equaling four nights altogether.  its placement is virtually in the same area, give or take several miles.  it appears to come anywhere around 5:30, 6:00pm and leaves by 7:00, 7:15pm same night.
content.summary: Saw one craft idle for 50 minutes while also watched others mysteriously appear then fly away.

content.detailedDescription:
I posted about a bright star-like object in the sky in spring lake, nc, a few weeks ago.  this is a follow-up.  this same star-like object appears in the sw sky every night that the sky is clear.  it appears at twilight about 80 degrees in the sky above the horizon.  it is visible for about an hour and a half, slowly descending towards the north, disappearing at about 30 degrees above the horizon. it looks like it rotates around with a flashing red light on the top, and when it rotates, there is like a black line down the middle, like it separates in half - almost like what an amoeba or a cell looks like when it divides, but then it seems to merge together again.  

several days into this i felt the urge to talk to the thing, feeling pretty much nuts since i hadn't even believed in ufos a few weeks ago.  i said, "if we are communicating, then move." my husband was watching from another room and didn't hear me say that, but he yelled, "hey, it's moving!"  it moved around like the point of an etch-a-sketch when you jiggle it around but it moved back to its original position.  i thought, "okay, that's a fluke," so i said it again.  and it moved the same way again.  

then, a few nights after that (i can't really pay attention every night because i work and have small children) i got out my phone and decided to tape a little.  i said, "okay, if we're communicating, then move."  it disappeared immediately.  i was nonplussed and moved my camera around looking and suddenly realized the light had jumped about 25 degrees to the right.  i laughed because it seemed like a game to me.

i have this on tape, but i'm sort of nervous about posting it.  the night after it happened i came home and there were two military helicopters circling our neighborhood for about two hours.  i've lived in this area for a long time and i'm used to military air craft but i had never seen anything like that before.  it rattled me, because i think they were looking for something and i think it had to do with the sightings.

several nights after my post i was watching the "star" and, because we are near to ft. bragg, i was looking around to see if there was any other activity in the air.  i was sitting on a swing set in my backyard and staring straight up when it seemed like the stars were wobbling.  as i watched, i compared the position of the stars to the trees that were stable and noticed that it seemed as if the stars were "off."  looking in this area made my eyes ache as if i were looking at a bright light but it was dark so it seemed weird that my eyes were hurting.  as i watched to figure out what was going on, the edges of something huge and black were barely noticeable but the backdrop of stars would suddenly look normal as if something camouflaged had moved past them so i was seeing the real thing.  then i noticed that the "stars" were moving in concert with one another and then i thought that it might be some huge cloaked object with lights made to look like the stars -- maybe stealth technology?  but there was absolutely no noise and it was bigger than anything in the sky i've ever seen.  i don't know how close it was because there was really no reference point.  if it were as high as a regular airplane flies, it is gigantic.

then a few nights ago i went to robeson county for thanksgiving, not really thinking about my friend or anything but when i stepped outside there it was.  i was delighted because i feel excited every time i see any of them.  the sky is much clearer out there in the country and i noticed there were a lot more of those "stars" but they seemed smaller or further away.  they were moving around.  there were also several of the lights that moved together, making it look like there were a lot of those large dark ships in the sky.  some of the lights were directly above us and when we would say hi they would sparkle on and off.  i finally broke down and got some binoculars from walmart to try to see what the friend looked like.  it is like a roundish cell of dancing light divided down the middle, but you can't always see the black line because it rotates.  finally i said, "i'd like to see what you are because i can't tell." then it turned and looked like a ring of prism fire.  the best way to describe it is it looked like an eclipse looks like when a planet blocks out the sun, like a black hole in a strange fire.  then it rotated again and looked like the glob of light again.

just now (nov. 30th at about 10 p. m.) i went outside to see if any of them are out.  the one i usually see is not visible, but there is one in the eastern sky.  it is very bright but smaller than the one i usually see.  it also is bright white with a red light.  

i have no idea what any of this means.  i want to let everyone know this stuff is real, take it from the former ultimate skeptic.  i'm still trying to explain it but the more i see the harder i get.  i wish others in this area would start watching and try to help me understand what in the world it all is.  however, i have to say i have felt weirded out but ultimately i feel very friendly with them, as if they are pen pals that i finally am getting the chance to meet in real life.
content.summary: Many star-like bright

content.detailedDescription: Around 830 in the evening...Went outside when dog went out in the backyard, saw and commented on orion in the sky and then saw the object..At first almost look blurry/cloud like but definitely not... appeared in a longish half-circle/boomerang type shape with multiple glowing/softish lights moving steadily left to right (which was towards the southeast)...We were both in awe and freaked out as to what it could be.  it disappeared out of our sight behind trees...Probably saw it for around 20 seconds...Which at the time felt quite long.
content.summary: Misty like glowing lights in a half cirlce/boomerang type shape moving steadily to the se caught us off guard

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were traveling southbound on hwy 41 returning to our home in oshkosh from green bay. it was late afternoon on november 30th 2013.  about one mile outside of little chute we noticed a dark circle ahead in the distance over the highway's left lane.  we watched it as we got closer we realized it was completely motionless.  there was a car slightly in front of me on in the left lane that i was sure was going to hit it.  as we approached it the object appeared very metallic in the headlights of the car.  it hovered over the highway at about 8 feet, and was approximately the size of a basketball, or slightly larger.  as the car in front of me passed directly underneath it, the object did not move at all.  it hovered completely motionless even when the car passed under it.  this happened around 4:40 p.M. and as soon as i got home i reported it to fox 11 news as well as some other stations.  this was by far the strangest thing i have ever seen in my 33 years on the planet.  whatever this was, it was silent, motionless, metallic, and unaffected by air movement.
content.summary: Metallic sphere hovering approximately 8-10 feet above the left south bound lane over hwy 41.

content.detailedDescription:
In the year 1983 i was in service in the soviet army. we were in central kazachstan - baykonur - soviet space and missile sight. approximately in spring of 1983 the entire battalion was summoned on emergency call to a main plaz in front of the battalion headquarters. it was very unsual because number one - it never happened before at night. number two - nobody knew the reason or what was going on. officers had no idea why we were called out. after a few minutes someone point our attention to the sky. there was a huge - i mean really big - object covering about one quarter of the sky. its like looking at the bottom of the plate. all we could see was a perfect circle of blackness with a slight glow around the edges. after a while (about 30-45 minutes) this object simply disappeared. shortly after we were called back to baracks. eventhough i never seen any landing or flight of this object - it probably scared our military high command quite a lot. enough to call out all the battalions in the area to high alert.
i realize that this sighting by itself is insignificant, but it might help you in conjunction with other sightings or simply to keep the timeline.
content.summary: A huge circle hovered above the baracks on bayconur for 30min.

content.detailedDescription:
November 24, about 5:30 pm: as my mom and i were driving home, south on i-5, very near 34, and i saw a weird something. i was stargazing, hoping to see a ufo, and then i saw the fast ascending light. at first i thought it was a meteor, but this object was traveling up from the horizon. i was super-excited. we drove past where the object was ascending and i lost sight of it.
it was a really light red, almost white, and it was going upwards at a slant. it looked like it was about 500 yards from a big-ish house/barn (i couldn't tell which) and it was bright and shiny. well, not that bright. it had about the bright-and-shininess of one of those really far away stars. it looked bigger though. from where i was, it looked about the size of the tip of a dull pencil. it was weird.
content.summary: Starlike object moving quickly from low elevation to high

content.detailedDescription: We were invited to the fireworks that july foth we were getting late for the event and i have two of my nieces at the house so it was time to go and i was driven on reverse to take the my steert south when i sorely stopped the car there was that objects i ask everyone in the car do you see it they yes then i try to get closer and it desopear in front of my eye's
content.summary: We were going to drop off my niece as soon we come out from the drive way it was there the ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was out in front of the house at about 10 at night and noticed the green object hovering as i watced it move over the long beach area the circled around with out slowing then quickly and smoothly came to our area making various turns and motions no plane or helicopter could make as it moved to the eastern sky i called my girl friend down se wittised it as we watched it dipped below the roof lines and disappeared it came back up and as we watched it vannised and came back 2 times she went in when it disappeared as i watched it appeared again only this time the object was ablue color both times this object had a red light on the bottom but unlike planes and helicopters in the area there was no blinking as with all aircraft.We don't know what it was but its range of movement and speed were not anything like we have ever seen before
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object first appeared as a green oblonged shape then changed to a blue color
